Title: [L04][Fixed] Lack of indexed parameters in events
Content:
Throughout the codebase, there are cases where the events do not index their parameters. Some of them are:


* The [`OtokenCreated` event](https://github.com/opynfinance/GammaProtocol/blob/d151621b33134789b29dc78eb89dad2b557b25b9/contracts/OtokenFactory.sol#L36-L38) from the `OtokenFactory` contract does not index the assets involved.
* The [`PriceUpdated` event](https://github.com/opynfinance/GammaProtocol/blob/d151621b33134789b29dc78eb89dad2b557b25b9/contracts/Oracle.sol#L41) from the `Oracle` contract does not index both asset and new pricer.


Consider [indexing event parameters](https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/contracts.html#events) to avoid hindering the task of off-chain services searching and filtering for specific events.


**Update:** *Fixed in [PR#286](https://github.com/opynfinance/GammaProtocol/pull/286).*
